English: I enjoy reading books in my free time.
Spanish: Me gusta leer libros en mi tiempo libre.

English: The school system in Spain is very different from the one in the United States.
Spanish: El sistema educativo en España es muy diferente del uno de Estados Unidos.

English: I am taking a course on Spanish literature at university.
Spanish: Estoy tomando un curso sobre literatura española en la universidad.

English: The professor gave us an interesting lecture on history yesterday.
Spanish: El profesor nos dio una conferencia interesante sobre la historia ayer.
